info.name: Pericallosal artery
info.description: The pericallosal artery is the continuation of the anterior cerebral artery as it arches superiorly and posteriorly over the corpus callosum.  It supplies portions of the medial surface of the hemisphere as well as part of the corpus callosum.
info.item: /Sections/Thick, Whole Brain/Sagittal & Parasagittal/Medial to Lateral/1 Parasag: Med to Lat
